overview: The tenth installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. There are many places in this world that should not be approached. It's not reason or reason. It is a place where spiritual factors are involved. Like this video, the places where there have been devastating incidents in the past The victim's resentment is ingrained in the land, and it becomes a ground-bound spirit. In addition, such a place is called a haunted spot and attracts many people. On the contrary, it will further strengthen the resentment of the victim.
title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 10
